page.title: 04HOUSING,NW.NEWBURY & SPEEN
page.content: {COUNCIL}housing comprises majority of urban area housing.Almost entirely post war development in two major eatates at {SHAW & SPEEN}which includes some blocks of 3 story flats. However each estate includes {PRIVATE {sector}housing.Present building limited due to land shortage.Some Council housing now privately owned. {RURAL AREA HOUSING}ranges from cottages to large detached houses and mansions.Both urban & rural housing generally well maintained. {CONSTRUCTION}mostly brick with tiled roofs;some thatch in rural area. {HOUSES PRICES}range from Â£28,000 to Â£120,000 plus,averaging Â£35 to Â£45,000. Some private dwellings on outskirts of area used as weekend or holiday accommodation.
